医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
早期数据显示 mRNA-4359 可能有益于晚期实体癌患者mRNA 癌症免疫疗法 (mRNA-4359) I 期剂量递增部分的中期数据显示出对晚期实体癌患者的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Early-data-shows-mRNA-4359-may-benefit-患者-with-advanced-solid-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Early-data-shows-mRNA-4359-may-benefit-患者-with-advanced-solid-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fee0aec8-0376-4ce8-b069-58776550e7f5 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 00:19:00 -0400 Early data shows mRNA-4359 may benefit patients with advanced solid cancers
卡迪夫研究使用 WhatsApp 提高黑人男性对前列腺癌的认识卡迪夫大学的研究人员正在研究 WhatsApp 的使用如何让布特敦和格兰奇敦的黑人了解前列腺癌风险信息并提高前列腺癌意识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Cardiff-study-uses-WhatsApp-to-boost-prostate-cancer-awareness-among-Black-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Cardiff-study-uses-WhatsApp-to-boost-prostate-cancer-awareness-among-Black-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d708b33a-178e-4e94-955a-088d86b748c7 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 00:18:00 -0400 Cardiff study uses WhatsApp to boost prostate cancer awareness among Black men
软饮料消费量增加与肝病风险增加相关研究发现，在墨西哥成年人群体中，软饮料摄入量增加与非酒精性脂肪肝疾病的风险增加相关，尤其是男性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Higher-soft-drink-conspiration-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Higher-soft-drink-conspiration-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8993501-b8a5-4f47-b2fe-5aaf2f7df5c1 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 00:18:00 -0400 Higher soft drink consumption linked to increased risk of liver disease
新数据显示子宫内膜异位症患者持续挣扎令人担忧的新数据显示，与世纪之交一样，子宫内膜异位症患者的生活经历在今天显得令人沮丧和痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-data-shows-persistent-struggles-for-endometriosis-sufferers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-data-shows-persistent-struggles-for-endometriosis-sufferers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ff2be22-4693-4eff-8944-33de98b2aa77 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 00:15:00 -0400 New data shows persistent struggles for endometriosis sufferers
有健康问题的澳大利亚人强烈主张持续采取 COVID-19 安全措施研究显示，超过一半患有基础健康问题的澳大利亚人继续支持并遵循 COVID-19 缓解措施，这突显了尽管政府放松了指令，但仍存在持续的公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Australians-with-health-conditions-strongly-advocate-for-ongoing-COVID-19-safety-measures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Australians-with-health-conditions-strongly-advocate-for-ongoing-COVID-19-safety-measures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f4f76d3-10c3-4352-beea-7069464e39c8 Sun, 15 Sep 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Australians with health conditions strongly advocate for ongoing COVID-19 safety measures
气候变化塑造了人类进化，推动了古代景观的迁移和文化适应研究人员揭示了过去的气候变化和植被变化如何推动更新世早期人类物种的进化和迁徙。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Climate-change-shape- human-evolution-driven-migration-and-culture-adaptation-across-ancient-landscapes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Climate-change-shape- human-evolution-driven-migration-and-culture-adaptation-across-ancient-landscapes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd8237a0-f490-4199-a786-30456b5eda55 Sun, 15 Sep 2024 23:20:00 -0400 Climate change shaped human evolution, driving migration and cultural adaptation across ancient landscapes
生酮饮食可恢复多囊卵巢综合症女性的月经周期并提高生育能力一项研究表明，生酮饮食使所有患有多囊卵巢综合症的女性恢复了月经周期，其中超过一半的女性实现了怀孕。这种饮食可能是提高生育能力的一种有前途的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Ketogenic-diet-restores-menstrual-cycles-and-boosts-fertility-in-women-with-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Ketogenic-diet-restores-menstrual-cycles-and-boosts-fertility-in-women-with-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5107297a-8fde-47e3-817c-dc3d2f1e9602 Sun, 15 Sep 2024 23:01:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet restores menstrual cycles and boosts fertility in women with PCOS
妊娠早期 HbA1c 可预测妊娠期糖尿病，减少复杂测试的需要妊娠早期 HbA1c 可以预测妊娠糖尿病并减少口服葡萄糖耐量测试的需要，从而提高不同人群的筛查可及性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Early-pregnancy-HbA1c-predicts-gestational-diabetes-reducing-the-need-for-complex-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240915/Early-pregnancy-HbA1c-predicts-gestational-diabetes-reducing-the-need-for-complex-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5360ab88-c89e-45b8-acd6-25cd6eea5b1d Sun, 15 Sep 2024 20:23:00 -0400 Early pregnancy HbA1c predicts gestational diabetes, reducing the need for complex tests
抗体-药物偶联物显示出治疗卵巢癌和子宫内膜癌的前景ESMO 2024 上报告的研究揭示了患有早期子宫内膜癌和宫颈癌的新女性群体，她们通过在当前标准治疗中添加免疫疗法获得了具有临床意义的益处，而一项首次人体研究发现新型抗体药物具有“有前景”的抗肿瘤活性针对接受过多次治疗的卵巢癌和子宫内膜癌患者的紧密蛋白 6 蛋白结合物 (ADC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240914/Antibody-drug-conjugate-shows-promise-in-treating-ovarian-and-endometrial-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240914/Antibody-drug-conjugate-shows-promise-in-treating-ovarian-and-endometrial-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9bd0323-72d0-4c65-a06c-8cc27f24a466 Sat, 14 Sep 2024 06:33:00 -0400 Antibody-drug conjugate shows promise in treating ovarian and endometrial cancers
美国国立卫生研究院资助新研究对抗新出现的病毒阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦医学院从美国国家过敏和传染病研究所 (NIAID) 获得了为期五年、每年 1400 万美元的拨款，用于参与全国范围内开发“即插即用”疫苗和基于抗体的疫苗针对多种新出现病毒的疗法。这笔赠款是 NIAID 今天早些时候宣布的新的大流行病疫苗和单克隆抗体研发 (ReVAMPP) 网络的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240914/NIH-funds-new-research-to-combat-emerging-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240914/NIH-funds-new-research-to-combat-emerging-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c36635e-373b-4bf8-aea9-a05ef3c65644 Sat, 14 Sep 2024 06:02:54 -0400 NIH funds new research to combat emerging viruses
